title: Why do the other K-pop groups have small views on their videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: It bothers me that big fandoms always run it in the noses of smaller fandoms that they don’t have as many views. As if we don’t know that the large fandoms aren’t pushing the members to mass stream a video. When you have a fandom of thousands competing against a fandom of hundreds. It’s unfair! When will KPop begin judging by talent and not streams.
